HelpBalloon.title: Execution
HelpBalloon.content: With this setting you define how often a recipient can run a campaign. If the recipient is to receive a date-controlled campaign, such as a birthday campaign, every year, then you need the setting permanent. If a recipient is to receive a campaign only once, even if he meets the criteria several times, e.g. reaction-controlled when opening a certain mailing, then set this setting once - otherwise the campaign would be triggered anew for this recipient every time he opens it.
